q: You have $50 to buy supplies for a project. If pens cost $2 each and notebooks cost $5 each, how many pens can you buy if you get 3 notebooks?
Your club needs 100 cookies for an event. Each batch makes 25 cookies and takes 30 minutes. How long will it take to bake enough?
A trip is 120 miles, and your car gets 30 miles per gallon. Gas costs $3 per gallon. How much will the trip cost?
You need to paint a room 10 ft by 12 ft. One can of paint covers 40 sq ft and costs $20. How much will it cost?
A class has 24 students, and you need teams of 4. How many teams will there be?
You have 2 hours to finish 3 tasks: Task A takes 30 min, Task B takes 45 min. How much time for Task C?
A store offers a 20% discount on a $50 item. What’s the final price?
You need 5 volunteers for an event, but only 3 signed up. How many more do you need?
A garden is 8 ft by 6 ft. Fencing costs $5 per ft. How much to fence it?
You’re organizing seats for 30 people. Each row holds 6. How many rows?
A recipe needs 2 cups of flour for 12 cookies. How much for 18 cookies?
You have $100 for a trip. A ticket costs $45, and food is $20. How much is left?
A book is 200 pages, and you read 25 pages a day. How many days to finish?
You need 4 posters, each costing $6, and $10 for tape. What’s the total cost?
A team needs to raise $500. Each member raises $50. How many members?
You’re packing 24 items into boxes of 6. How many boxes?
A bus holds 40 people. If 120 people need rides, how many buses?
You have 90 minutes to study 3 subjects equally. How long per subject?
A shirt costs $30 after a 25% discount. What was the original price?
You need 10 chairs for a meeting, but have 6. How many more?
A fence is 50 ft long, and paint costs $2 per ft. What’s the cost?
You’re splitting $60 among 4 friends equally. How much per friend?
A task takes 3 people 6 hours. How long for 2 people?
You need 15 balloons, and each pack has 5. How many packs?
A movie is 120 minutes, and you start at 7:00 PM. When does it end?
